price: (19) [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
